overview:
Peter is a senior project professional with a track record of delivering strategic change programmes into blue-chip financial services organizations.

With strong management experience and a technical background Peter is able to align the organization on common goals and drive to delivery.

Specialties Skills Project Portfolio Management, Investment Banking, Offshore Outsourcing, Vendor Management, Stakeholder Management, project and department rescue.

Industries: Financial Services, Wealth Management, Asset Management, Investment Management, Fund Management, Private Banking, Public-Private partnerships, Government agencies
